newsitem.title: USA: MacNeal-Schwendler Corp discontinues dividends. [CORRECTED 14:35 GMT]
newsitem.headline: MacNeal-Schwendler Corp discontinues dividends. [CORRECTED 14:35 GMT]

text.p: MacNeal-Schwendler Corp said on Friday it will discontinue paying dividends.
(Corrects company name in headline and first paragraph from MSC Industrial Direct Co Inc).

The company said the move is being taken "to increase funds available for growth." It said it is "already making gains" in cash reserves, but that it has "undertaken a more aggressive growth strategy that will require additional funds."

"This strategy is intended to enable MSC to produce the flow of new products necessary to increase shareholder value and provide us the flexibility to respond quickly to growth opportunities," said Chief Executive Thomas Curry, in a statement accompanying the announcement.
